A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It may be less polished than Abrams' remake of A New Hope\, but for once - in my lifetime at least - Star Wars has been honoured with a script that says something\, with characters that are deeply flawed and complex\, and at last with a film that hasn't been ruthlessly pressed into a corporate product\, developed to please the hoards of consumers with gleaming effects and fast-paced action; it's far greater than that. The Last Jedi felt worlds closer to being a real movie than The Force Awakens and it has given me hope for the future\, I am glad that Disney is investing in this. Viva la revolución!
